name: Wild (itch) (Sébastien Rioux, Damien Leclercq, Amir1632, William FILIPE)
name_original: Wild (itch) (Sébastien Rioux, Damien Leclercq, Amir1632, William FILIPE)
description:
WILD brings you into the merciless and hostile world of the savannah. Here, you're not the king. Incarnate a lost lion cub unable to protect himself and searching for his family.



In WILD you play a Lion Cub separated from his family. Helpless and alone in the savannah, you need to be careful to survive in this hostile environment and get back to your family. You must avoid predators, hide in bush and use your lion cub instinct to get back alive.

We are a group of 15 students, 12 of the Video Game axis of the Institute of Internet and Multimedia(IIM) and 3 of Audio workshop. We had several constraints for the project, that it has to be done in 2 months and that the game has an isometric view. We hope you enjoy our game!
